secondPart: My sister has already cooked a big cake.
They have already gone to the sports center.
Your friend has already come to the party.
My father has worked in China for a long time.
My aunt’s baby has just broken the glass.
I have studied at the library for one hour.
They have lived in this flat for many years.
I have worked as a lawyer for two years.
I have just come back from my perfect holiday.
My mom has just sent you a message.
My wife has been in the shower for 40 minutes!
I have seen this film several times before.
I have been to the USA many times.
He has been our teacher for four years now.
I have thought about it for two hours.
It has been cold for the last three days.
We have eaten at that restaurant many times.
I have been in this city for twenty years.
Everybody in the class has already finished the test.
I have forgotten my documents in the study.
Joanne Rowling has written several stories about Harry Potter.
My parents have just bought a new car.
My father has worked in New York for three years.
He had finished his homework before he went to play football.
She had cooked lunch before the children came back.
He had traveled to Italy before the end of the holiday.
I had left the amusement park before noon.
My son had gone to school before I came home.
I had washed my car before the rain started.
My daughter said she had seen this film.
The match had finished before I turned on the TV.
He remembered that he had left his passport at home.
I thought you had invited your sister to the party.
I read his book before he had become famous.
He asked me which animals I had seen in Australia.
He said that he had passed all the exams.
I had learned German before I visited Berlin.
He had lived in London before he moved to Los Angeles.
She had cleaned the house before the guests arrived.
I went outside after I had heard a strange noise.
He was sad because he had missed the train.
We had found our dog by the end of the day.
I had seen jaguars in the zoo before I went to Africa.
I had met him before you introduced us.
You said you had bought this dress in the shopping mall.
I had fallen asleep before ten o’clock.
They had lived in Japan for fifteen years before they moved to Spain.
They had had the house for eight years before the fire.
After they had eaten breakfast they went to work.
They had left the school before the principal came.
The teacher had ended the class before we took the notes.
My father had given me a phone before I turned fourteen.
I had written the paper before two o’clock in the afternoon.
He had finished decorating the house when they came.
Mom had made an apple pie before we returned from camping.
The match had finished when I reached the stadium.
He had read his favourite comic book before going to school.
He had played hockey in the field before the rain started.
I helped him to do the task after I had finished my work.
I was sure that I had seen her somewhere before.
I had gone to bed when my parents came back home.
We had called a taxi when the show was over.
